    • sendRobotTextMessage

      @PostMapping("/robot/text") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> sendRobotTextMessage(@RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="ee0f1d50-25dc-4e0c-8f40-3b3af5f7cf6b") String key, @RequestParam String content, @RequestParam(required=false) List<String> mentionedList, @RequestParam(required=false) List<String> mentionedMobileList)
      发送文本消息到企业微信群 http://127.0.0.1:9003/test/api/v1/wechat/work/robot/text?content=hello
      Parameters:
      key - webhook密钥，默认使用readme.md中的key
      content - 消息内容
      mentionedList - 要@的用户ID列表
      mentionedMobileList - 要@的手机号列表
      Returns:
      发送结果
